options: That he slept with Kim Alexis
That he was abducted by aliens
That he got a girl pregnant
questions.explanation:
That he won $5.

	Cliff wanted to prove that as rumors spread the more outlandish they become. However, his plan backfired when it got back to Norm (and thus Cliff) and they told Norm that some guy was excited about winning $5.

questions.text: Who was coming to Cheers in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Murray Treadwell.

	Murray Treadwell was played by Peter Elbling. He was born November 29, 1943 in London. Along with being an actor he is also a writer for movies.

questions.text: What did the reviewer say about Cheers the last time he reviewed it?
questions.explanation:
Barful of bores.

	Sam was not happy about being reviewed again because Treadwell was so hard to please. Rebecca figured things would be different because they were under new management.

questions.text: Who did Carla think Eddie got a job with?
questions.explanation:
Pittsburgh Penguins.

	Carla was bragging that her husband was now the goalie for the Pittsburgh Penguins. She said they had a great uniform too.

questions.text: What job did Eddie actually get?
questions.correct: a penguin for the Wonderful World of Ice
options: a ranger for a state park
questions.explanation:
a penguin for the Wonderful World of Ice.

	He wore his work uniform (a penguin costume) to Cheers. Woody asked if their home uniforms were that cool too.

Carla.

	Eddie thought Carla was embarrassed about his new job and that was why she wouldn't come out to see him. It turned out she was not embarrassed but afraid to fly, or as she put it "afraid to crash".

questions.text: What did Frasier tell the people on the plane to focus on?
questions.explanation:
their happy place.

	Frasier was working with Carla and some other people who were afraid to fly. He told them that when they felt scared they should return to their happy place.

questions.text: Why did everyone think Rebecca slept with the reviewer?
options: Rebecca was known for sleeping around.
The reviewer said he slept with her.
The bar got a bad review but Rebecca got a good review.
questions.explanation:
Cheers got a good review.

	They all kept teasing Rebecca about it. Even when people would call to congratulate her on the phone, they asked if she slept with him.

questions.text: Who did not accuse Rebecca of sleeping with the reviewer?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Frasier was busy with helping people overcome their few of flying. The others however did accuse her of sleeping with the reviewer. Al said, "So how was he?" And Evan called on the phone and asked her if she slept with him. Sam just constantly accused her of it.

questions.text: Who became scared on the plane?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	The other people's fears got to Frasier and soon he was scared. By this point however, Carla was no longer scared to fly and ended up going to see Eddie.
